name: Vixon's Illustrious Styles - Vinneart
description:
This LoRA weaves images in the delicate, dreamlike essence of the artist’s soul. Each stroke is kissed by stardust, echoing the quiet magic of forgotten forests and twilight skies. It doesn't simply mimic a style—it channels a whisper from another world, where colors bloom like moonlit flowers and forms drift in a haze of wonder. Let it guide your vision, as though painting with the artist's own enchanted breath.

To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

DO NOT REUPLOAD

fuck seaart/tensor, ect - do not scrap for reupload

name: 🐻 MoonToon – Retro Comic Style [ILL]
description:
MoonToon – Retro Comic Style was inspired by and trained on images generated with my models 🐻 MoonToon Mix and Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving. The goal was to combine the comic-like texture and structure of Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving with the soft, toon-style aesthetics of 🐻 MoonToon Mix.

All training images were created using only these two models. However, the LoRA works not only with 🐻 MoonToon Mix, but also with many other Illustrious-based checkpoints.

It’s less aggressive than Retro-Futurist Comic Engraving and aims to guide the image more gently into the desired style.

Sweet spot: 0.65 – 0.85
Tested range: 0.1 – 2.0
Trigger word: moto-retcom
Helpful prompt tags: retro, flat, toon, retro_artstyle

name: Mizuki Hitoshi|みずき ひとし
description:
This LoRA is trained to replicate the delightful and charming art style of the Japanese artist Mizuki Hitoshi (みずき ひとし).

The style is characterized by its incredibly cute and appealing character designs, vibrant color palettes, soft yet detailed shading, and beautifully rendered expressive eyes. It perfectly captures a "moe" aesthetic that is both sweet and captivating.

Key Features:

  • Authentic Style: Faithfully reproduces Mizuki Hitoshi's signature look.

  • Versatile for Characters: Trained primarily on the artist's high-quality illustrations of Touhou Project characters, this model excels at generating fan art of the series. It is also highly adaptable for creating your own Original Characters (OCs) with the same charming aesthetic.

  • NSFW Potential: Given the artist's background, this model has a good understanding of anatomy and can be guided towards more suggestive or NSFW creations if desired.

How to Use:

  • Trigger Word: Add mizukihitoshi to your prompt.

  • Recommended Weight: A weight of 0.7 - 0.9 works best for strong style replication. You can lower the weight to blend the style with other LoRAs or checkpoints.

  • Helpful Tags: For best results, combine the trigger word with descriptive tags such as anime style, cute, solo, detailed hair, vibrant colors, detailed shading.

  • Character Generation: To create specific Touhou characters, simply add their name tags (e.g., hakurei reimu, kirisame marisa, remilia scarlet).

Enjoy creating your own adorable characters with this style!

name: Stabilizer Rouwei
description:
Stabilizer for RouWei

I see tails, everywhere.

Note: Cover images are directly from a1111, at default 1MP resolution. No upscale, no plugins, no imprinting fixes.

What is this

RouWei is a large scale finetune from Illustrious v0.1 with a dataset of ~13M pictures (~4M with natural text captions).

  • Solved main problems with tags bleeding and biases, common for Illustrious, NoobAi and other checkpoints

  • Dataset cut-off - end of April 2025.

  • vpred + epslion.

  • Built-in color/brightness/contrast control: low brightness, high brightness, low saturation...

  • too many features...

Stabilizer is a tiny finetune LoRA with ~7k hand-picked images. See this main page for info. Quick recap:

  • It can reduce overfitted noise because it was trained on clean, natural, high res real world images with strong logical and structural relationships.

  • It adds natural lighting, texture, details.

  • It doesn't have a default style. The dataset is very diverse. So no style shifting.

  • Dataset has full natural language captions. (<75 tokens)

  • It only patches U-Net. Does not patch text encoder.

How to use

Version prefix:

  • epv080b: Trained on RouWei epsilon v0.8.0 base.

  • vpv080: Trained on RouWei v-pred v0.8.0.

Note:

  • epsilon version is much easier to use. It's just normal good old SDXL that has already been supported by all software. I personally prefer epsilon, usually has better details and textures.

  • v-pred version requires specific parameters and settings, see RouWei main page for more info.

  • RouWei is based on illustrious v0.1, so it supports most illustrious LoRAs.

Update logs

(07/25/2025) v080epb v0.3

  • This is all most a full training on the "v0.8 epsilon base".

(07/24/2025) v080vp v0.1

  • Initial release. Let's see what we got.

  • The training strategy is very conservative. So it won't bring big changes to images. Most of the time it needs strength > 0.8.

  • Feedback is welcomed.

name: Emerjk Summons 1 (Megaten Megapack)
description:
Just an attempt to improve generation of some of my favorite demons from the megaten franchise while opening up some cosplay options. For most uses I'd probably suggest just using dedicated loras rather than this one. That said, I like how some elements turned out. Mothman in particular tends to veer off from the official art, but there's something inherently fun about the goofy little guy as a giant semi-realistic kaiju. The only total failure was mara. He's in my dataset, but I've never been able to consistently generate images of him with this lora. With the rest of them, some are almost always going to come out OK while others are a rare roll of the dice. That said, here's the main demons/characters provided by this lora that are worth trying for:

Lilim

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

这是一个全新的精调训练lora模型，使用了超过200张高质量的原始图片进行训练。

素材全部来自 ：

  1. 荒川弘 的原画设定集；

碎碎念：

  1. 度假回来了~远离电子产品和网络的日子纯净的可以洗涤心灵~

  2. 最近的委托难度是越来越高了啊，冷门+上古时代+素材匮乏，好在经过多轮调整过后，结果都还不错~~能够帮人完成心愿，也算是赛博积德了吧~ o(*￣︶￣*)o

name: Dark Melody Echoes
description:
Dark Melody Echoes" is a developing LoRA 🚧, representing a first exploration into infusing creations with an atmosphere of gothic drama 🦇 and melancholic beauty 🥀 using the SDXL model. Inspired by the duality of beauty and darkness, its core concept blends the delicacy of a feminine figure with the dark intensity of mythical and circus creatures, exemplified by a Medusa with headphones 🎧. Key training elements included "Darkness," "A sweet girl," "A Medusa," "A clown," "An octopus," and the emotional trigger "How does your heart beat to the sound of this song?!" ❤️‍🔥. The primary trigger word for this LoRA is d4rkn355, which should be placed before the main subject (e.g., d4rkn355 Medusa) to effectively apply its unique style. This tool 🛠️, while still undergoing adjustments, shows great potential ✨ for artists to explore the depths of emotion and drama, adding a unique layer of complexity and somber beauty to their creations. 🌌

There's a good chance you'll see headphones🎧, a heart❤️, snakes🐍, and tentacles🐙! If you don't want these elements, add them to the negative prompt!

name: 30ML (30MINUTES lable) models
description:
This LoRA model is specially designed for creators and fans of BANDAI's 30 MINUTES LABEL (30MM / 30MS / 30MF) model kit series.

It helps generate:

  • Custom color schemes for original mechs

  • Armor design inspiration for mecha-girls (30MS)

  • Fantasy character ideas and sci-fi weapon variations

  • Background art and diorama sketch concepts

This model is optimized to assist model kit builders and illustrators by providing visual references for painting, kitbashing, and character design.

For: Plastic model builders, diorama designers, mecha-girl creators, AI art enthusiasts
Best used with: ControlNet, pose conditioning, and thematic prompt mixing

🔧 What is 30 MINUTES LABEL (30ML)?

30ML is BANDAI's original plastic model kit brand, known for:

  • Quick assembly (most kits can be built in ~30 minutes)

  • Highly modular parts for easy customization

  • No glue or painting required (color-separated parts)

  • Multiple sub-lines that cater to different themes

It consists of three main series:

🌟 Sub-Series Overview

1. 30MM – 30 MINUTES MISSIONS

  • Theme: Mecha & military-style robots

  • Style: Realistic sci-fi

  • Features:

    • Interchangeable head, torso, limbs, backpack, weapons

    • 3mm ports and standardized joints for full compatibility

    • Great for army building and kitbashing

2. 30MS – 30 MINUTES SISTERS

  • Theme: Mecha-girls / Sci-fi female characters

  • Style: Anime-style girls with swappable armor

  • Features:

    • Articulated female bodies (painted faces)

    • Modular design for switching hairstyles, outfits, weapons

    • Compatible with 30MM weapons and accessories

3. 30MF – 30 MINUTES FANTASY (Upcoming)

  • Theme: Fantasy RPG-style characters

  • Style: Knights, wizards, monsters

  • Features:

    • Uses the same base body system as 30MS

    • Designed for fantasy settings (magic, swords, etc.)

    • Expected expansion from 2024 onward

-

  • Because I have reached 1K subscribers so this lora is a Thank You model

  • Because of UK members that won't have access to Civitai anymore tomorrow

Well so what is this ?

This is a stand alone lora with 12 effects.

--

What will it do ?

Add effect to your creations.

The strength need to be adjusted for some effects that are too strong but you do as you like :)

Strength is different from a checkpoint to another one. Some may render these better than others.

HOW TO USE :

Strength : tried from 0.4 to 1

Steps : 30 tested

Checkpoints : any ? Will work better with checkpoints having lots of fantasy or more artistic.

Tested on :

  • ilustreal v5 vae

  • cyberillustrious v5

  • realism illustrious v4.5 fp16

  • araxa v4

Adetailer : better with faces

--

No main trigger word

Each effect has its trigger word and description. See below.

You don't need to use all the words for each effect.

--

Effects part 1 :

https://civitai.com/articles/16600/effects-lora-part-1

To use, best way is "your prompt" + effect

--

Have fun :)

name: The Halloween Tree (1993 Cartoon Style) [Flux, Pony, Illustrious]
description:
The Halloween Tree is a 1993 animated fantasy-drama television film produced by Hanna-Barbera and based on Ray Bradbury's 1972 fantasy novel of the same name.

The film tells the story of a group of trick-or-treating children who learn about the origins and influences of Halloween when one of their friends is spirited away by mysterious forces. Bradbury serves as the narrator of the film, which also stars Leonard Nimoy as the children's guide, Mr. Moundshroud. Bradbury also wrote the film's Emmy Award winning screenplay. The animation of the film was produced overseas for Hanna-Barbera by Fil-Cartoons in the Philippines. The film premiered on ABC on October 2, 1993.

name: True Screencap
description:
Tired of that generic "AI look" in your anime generations? So was I. Most "anime screencap" LoRAs I tested left me with warped hands, blurry details, or muddy anatomy — hardly the crisp, expressive style found in actual anime scenes.

True Screencap was created to solve that. Trained on over 150 high-definition recent anime screencaps across a wide range of characters, creatures, poses, detailed backgrounds, and even NSFW content, this LoRA delivers clean, sharp, and natural-looking images — all while preserving accurate anatomy, nice eyes, overall clarity, and flexibility across checkpoints and/or when using other LoRAs.

Every image in the dataset was carefully tagged and selected to avoid the common issues plaguing other screencap models. The result? A LoRA that enhances your anime generations with the feel of real anime frames 🔥

Discord: killedmyself.

Support on kofi!

Tipping Buzz⚡ to images i like! so make sure to post some! Like, React, Follow, and all that stuff.

Tested with Better Days only at 1.0 strength. Should work with most checkpoints, but works best with Better Days for the lighting and color. Also you should just use Better Days if you can, you will enjoy it lol

changelog 0.1: focus on strong lighting, volumetrics, and such. favors blue light, red light, and low light scenes. not the best with backgrounds, limited dataset and all. i notice lower saturation overall. it looks very nice, however, you may need to add a CC node to your comfy workflow to combat it if you dont like it.

Settings (that i use. use what you prefer)

  • euler a

  • steps: 25

  • cfg: 4

  • i used upscaling, and face fix

Sorry for early access, but it costs me buzz for training ):

name: 97bxhx / 975bx Art Style - ILXL
description:
NOTE: To view all gallery images turn off X/XXX browsing level

Main prompt tags: 97bxhxstyle, 1boy <------ should always be included

Recommended samplers:
- Euler Ancestral Scheduler: Normal CFG: 3.0-4.5 Steps: 10-20 Lora strength: 1.0

Prompt tips (green - positive, red - negative):
- brown eyes / red eyes / yellow eyes etc. - main eye style
- bright pupils - second eye style
- simple eyes - third eye style
- circle eyebrows - oval version of eyebrows
- blush stickers - alternative blush style
- 1boy - recommended to include this as a lot of the images were trained on this tag
- furry - will help with anthro characters
- greyscale, sketch, monochrome - just to filter out any potential black and white images

The LoRa should support all kinds of Illustrious checkpoints. Tested working well with the following:

  • WAI-NSFW-illustrious-SDXL v12.0 / v14.0

  • Plant Milk - Flax

The style will work well with anime characters at 1.0 strength. For cartoon characters its hit or miss - if the style doesn't get applied right away then lower the weight of your character lora.

To improve details:
- generate using higher base resolution (e.g. 1216x1216) or use latent upscaling / highres fix - especially when trying to do full body poses
- for fixing wonky face/eyes I use FaceDetailer node (comfyui) + Adetailer Face finder model

Last image in the gallery can be imported into ComfyUI with a basic workflow:
The image can only be viewed if you disable X/XXX browsing levels.

Requires download of FaceDetailer custom nodes + Eyeful_v2-Paired.pt + FacesV1.pt models (can be Googled). Workflow includes a HiresFix pass with x1.20 latent upscaling by default.
For portraits/upper body shots I recommend lowering the upscaling ratio ('Upscale Latent By' node) - otherwise you might get distorted details.

description: Cc

name: 猫娘 / Cat girl
description:
此模型使用了 25 张我认为好看的猫娘图片进行训练，可以算得上是我理想中的猫娘。

未来可能会继续增加数据集。

此模型基于 Illustrious-XL-v2.0 训练，但是你也可以与其它模型搭配使用。

模型完全免费，并且仅发布于 Civitai，未上传至其他平台，请务必核实来源，避免下载到不明文件。

触发提示词：

maoniang_a, cat girl,

推荐使用：

  • LoRA 权重：0.8 - 1.0

  • 采样器：Euler a

  • Clip Skip：2

  • 开启高清修复（可选）
